name: Shaped Out
description:
Shoot at the enemies to knock them out of the ring, but don't let them knock you out. Enemies get stronger with time, but so can the player by picking up violet diamonds that would appear in the game. You lose a life when you are knocked out of the ring and gain a life when you pick up a red diamond.

Survive for as long as you can.

Controls:

Use W/A/S/D keys to move and left mouse button to shoot.

Tools used:
  • Unity3D
  • Photoshop CC
